long_description: Just as valuable as your paddle, a compass is one piece of equipment no kayaker should be without! Front-reading compass is graduated in 5deg increments for accurate bearings. Adjustable nylon straps with quick-release buckles secure compass to the deck of any kayak that has perimeter deck rigging. Rubber base prevents compass from shifting during rough seas.
short_description: Just as valuable as your paddle, a compass is one piece of equipment no kayaker should be without!
